27class MoveData {
28public:
29 string oldPos{};
30 string newPos{};
31 unsigned movingPieceIndex{ 65u };
32 unsigned takenPieceIndex{ 65u };
33 bool isMoveEnPassant{ false };
34 bool isMoveCastle{ false };
35 bool pieceHasMovedChanged{ false };
36 bool isPromotion{ false };
37 unsigned previousFiftyMoveRule{ 0 };
38public:
39bool operator==(const MoveData &other) const {
40 return (
41 oldPos == other.oldPos
42 && newPos == other.newPos
43 && movingPieceIndex == other.movingPieceIndex
44 && takenPieceIndex == other.takenPieceIndex
45 && isMoveEnPassant == other.isMoveEnPassant
46 && isMoveCastle == other.isMoveCastle
47 && pieceHasMovedChanged == other.pieceHasMovedChanged
48 && isPromotion == other.isPromotion
49 );
50}
51};
